item.title: Mode Control Panel Windows – Vertical Speed (VERT SPD)

remarks.para: May be inoperative provided Vertical Speed mode is not selected.

numlitem.para: If V/S mode is inoperative, do not select V/S mode. Another pitch mode may be selected when desired.

placard.para: Placard Vertical Speed window "INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
